diff --git a/src/sentry/static/sentry/less/fonts.less b/src/sentry/static/sentry/less/fonts.less
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..79f0101cfa
--- /dev/null
+++ b/src/sentry/static/sentry/less/fonts.less
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+@font-face {
+	font-family: 'sentry';
+	src:url('../fonts/sentry.eot');
+}
+@font-face {
+	font-family: 'sentry';
+	src: url(data:font/svg;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('svg'),
+		 url(data:font/ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
+	font-weight: normal;
+	font-style: normal;
+}
+
+/* Use the following CSS code if you want to use data attributes for inserting your icons */
+[data-icon]:before {
+	font-family: 'sentry';
+	content: attr(data-icon);
+	speak: none;
+	font-weight: normal;
+	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
+}
+
+/* Use the following CSS code if you want to have a class per icon */
+[class^="icon-"]:before, [class*=" icon-"]:before {
+	font-family: 'sentry';
+	font-style: normal;
+	speak: none;
+	font-weight: normal;
+	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
+}
+.icon-checkmark:before {
+	content: "\e000";
+}
+.icon-list:before {
+	content: "\e001";
+}
+.icon-cog:before {
+	content: "\e002";
+}
+.icon-arrow-down:before {
+	content: "\e003";
+}
+.icon-star:before {
+	content: "\2605";
+}
+.icon-checkmark-2:before {
+	content: "\2713";
+}
+.icon-pause:before {
+	content: "\e006";
+}
+.icon-plus:before {
+	content: "\e007";
+}
